projects.name: RegElk
projects.description: Improving Google Chrome's regular expression engine to support linear time lookbehinds. This was merged in the patch [3c83488](https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/v8/v8/+/5093860). I also implemented a few bug fixes and optimizations ([51eb31f](https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/v8/v8/+/4755530), [4ea6f8a](https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/v8/v8/+/5454791), [1284134](https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/v8/v8/+/4778506), [be15181](https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/v8/v8/+/5258237)).

projects.name: CS202
projects.description:
Educational projects for 2nd year bachelor students in computer science at EPFL. The projects are designed to teach them system programming and C programming.

 The projects are:
- 2023: A file system inspired by [UnixV6](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Version_6_Unix)
- 2024: An image database based on Facebook's [Haystack](https://www.usenix.org/event/osdi10/tech/full_papers/Beaver.pdf)
- 2025: Not revealed yet !
